publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1347# Mr Mike Rumbles: Access to NHS Dental Services in Grampian-That the Parliament recognises that improving access to NHS dental services is a public health priority, welcomes the publication by the Scottish Executive of An Action Plan for Dental Services in Scotland as a first step in this process but recognises that in the Grampian Health Board area more needs to be done to ensure access for all to NHS dental treatment. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*

S1M-1347# Access to NHS Dental Services in Grampian (lodged on 14 November 2000) Brian Adam*, Richard Lochhead*, Irene McGugan*, Alex Johnstone*, Shona Robison*, Nora Radcliffe*, Margaret Smith*, Robert Brown*, Donald Gorrie*, Euan Robson*, Ian Jenkins*, Mr Jamie Stone*, George Lyon*, Elaine Thomson*

S1M-1347# Mr Mike Rumbles: Access to NHS Dental Services in Grampian-That the Parliament recognises that improving access to NHS dental services is a public health priority, welcomes the publication by the Scottish Executive of An Action Plan for Dental Services in Scotland as a first step in this process but recognises that in the Grampian Health Board area more needs to be done to ensure access for all to NHS dental treatment. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald, Brian Adam, Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan, Alex Johnstone, Shona Robison, Nora Radcliffe, Margaret Smith, Robert Brown, Donald Gorrie, Euan Robson, Ian Jenkins, Mr Jamie Stone, George Lyon, Elaine Thomson
S1M-1347# Access to NHS Dental Services in Grampian (lodged on 14 November 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1347# Access to NHS Dental Services in Grampian (lodged on 14 November 2000) Dr Elaine Murray*

S1M-1347# Mr Mike Rumbles: Access to NHS Dental Services in Grampianâ€”That the Parliament recognises that improving access to NHS dental services is a public health priority, welcomes the publication by the Scottish Executive of An Action Plan for Dental Services in Scotland as a first step in this process but recognises that in the Grampian Health Board area, as in a number of rural areas of Scotland, more needs to be done to ensure access for all to NHS dental treatment. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald, Brian Adam, Richard Lochhead, Irene McGugan, Alex Johnstone, Shona Robison, Nora Radcliffe, Margaret Smith, Robert Brown, Donald Gorrie, Euan Robson, Ian Jenkins, Mr Jamie Stone, George Lyon, Elaine Thomson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Dr Elaine Murray, Mr David Davidson*
S1M-1347# Access to NHS Dental Services in Grampian (lodged on 14 November 2000) Ms Sandra White*
